errors.error_description: Incorrect mkdocs command using 'server' instead of 'serve'
correction_candidates: Use the command `mkdocs serve --dev-addr 0.0.0.0:8000` to start the local development server.
Use the command `mkdocs serve` to start the local development server.
Use the command `mkdocs serve --host 0.0.0.0` to start the local development server.
Use the command `mkdocs run --host 0.0.0.0` to start the local development server.
errors.golden_answer: Use the command `mkdocs serve --host 0.0.0.0` to start the local development server.
